text: Hi all! I have a recommendation for transcription work. I send out a ton of recordings for transcription as I write case studies and blog content from interviews. Normally, I use <http://Rev.com|Rev.com> which is an awesome service. However, I have a good friend who does transcription at about the same rate as Rev, and she's a joy! I'll be using her moving forward and highly recommend her to anyone needing transcripts. She's not exactly a "tool" but I wasn't sure where else to put this. Her name is Maggie Weber. maggiew at gmail.
